description: A pfeMemoryErrors notification is sent when the value
of jnxPfeParityErrors or jnxPfeEccErrors increases.

event.Summary: PFE memory errors: Parity errors: $v1; ECC errors: $v2

description: The parity error count
variables.name: JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeParityErrors

description: The ECC error count
variables.name: JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeEccErrors

description: Indicates that the Heap Memory utilization has crossed the
configured watermark.

event.Summary: PFE heap memory utilization exceeded threshold ($v2)

description: Global slot number for line card resource monitoring.
variables.name: JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeGlSlot

description: Configured high memory utilization threshold.
variables.name: JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeMemoryThreshold

description: Indicates that the Heap Memory utilization has fallen below the
configured watermark.

event.Summary: PFE heap memory utilization is within threshold $v2

description: Global slot number for line card resource monitoring.
variables.name: JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeGlSlot

description: Configured high memory utilization threshold.
variables.name: JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeMemoryThreshold

description: Indicates that the Next Hop Memory utilization has crossed the
configured watermark.

event.Summary: PFE next hop memory utilization exceeded threshold ($v3)

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeNextHopMemoryThresholdExceeded JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeGlSlot u 0 JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeInstanceNumber i 0 JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeMemoryThreshold u 0

description: Global slot number for line card resource monitoring.
variables.name: JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeGlSlot

description: PFE instance number in pfe complex.
variables.name: JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeInstanceNumber

description: Configured high memory utilization threshold.
variables.name: JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeMemoryThreshold

description: Indicates that the Next Hop Memory utilization has fallen below the
configured watermark.

event.Summary: PFE next hop memory utilization is below high threshold ($v3)

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeNextHopMemoryThresholdAbated JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeGlSlot u 0 JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeInstanceNumber i 0 JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeMemoryThreshold u 0

description: Configured high memory utilization threshold.
variables.name: JUNIPER-PFE-MIB::jnxPfeMemoryThreshold
